name: Dragon Ball FighterZ: Android 21 - Lab Coat
summary:
Android 21, an original character from DRAGON BALL FighterZ, now joins the fight in her appearance before transformation!

This content includes:
• Android 21 (Lab Coat) as a new playable character
• 5 alternative colors for her outfit
• Android 21 (Lab Coat) Lobby Avatar
• Android 21 (Lab Coat) Z Stamp
